pages.title: Lodestone Turbine
pages.text: The <item>Lodestone Turbine/$ produces <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/rotary)rotary power/$ for free constantly. It only works in dimensions where clocks and compasses spin uselessly (like the nether and end), by harnessing the large fluctuating magnetic fields that disrupt these devices.$(br2)It connect axially on the top, and can not raise the speed

<bobo>limitted POWAH! uNLIMITID eNErGY! i AM THE $(l:essentials:intro/welcome#bobo)BOBO!/$<bobo> i haz be113r verzun!$(br2)<bobo>watz broun und schtick-y?$(br2)<bobo>oRANGE ti3m$(br2)<bobo>dA ME3NING uv lI3F! ThA MANY-VERSE! &nd EVERYTING! butt on MEET nUGG-nUGG!/$$(br2)
